name: Synapse Studios
description:
Synapse Studios develops custom web applications from our sunny Tempe, Arizona offices. Our clients are startups (guys with some money and a dream, but little technical experience), universities, government agencies, and medium- to enterprise-sized companies.
We build custom web and mobile applications from the ground up: making the startup's dream a reality, building a back-end tool for a corporation to save a few million a year, or crafting simple, efficient apps to help our government and academic clients do their jobs better.
We build everything in-house and never outsource.
READ MORE...
